General: - Replaced the recent soul duplication hotfix with new behavior. Pre 10 min, lanes now always split orbs when there are more heroes than the assigned participants for that lane (3+ people in a dual lane, 2+ people in a solo). Previously it only split with 3+ people regardless of the lane, which is what allowed soul abuses when dipping into a solo lane.
- Private lobbies can now assign players to duo and solo lanes

Vindicta: - Fixed some recent bugs with {{HeroIcon|Hero=Vindicta|Size=20}} Vindicta {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight that could cause some large bursts in a direction
- Fixed being able to shoot while using {{ItemIcon|Item=Ethereal Shift|Size=20}} Ethereal Shift and flying with {{HeroIcon|Hero=Vindicta|Size=20}} Vindicta

Ethereal Shift: - Fixed being able to shoot while using {{ItemIcon|Item=Ethereal Shift|Size=20}} Ethereal Shift and flying with {{HeroIcon|Hero=Vindicta|Size=20}} Vindicta
Fire Rate: - {{ItemIcon|Item=Veil Walker|Size=20}} Veil Walker: {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate reduced from 30% to 20%
Veil Walker: - {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate reduced from 30% to 20%

Flight: - Fixed some recent bugs with {{HeroIcon|Hero=Vindicta|Size=20}} Vindicta {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight that could cause some large bursts in a direction
